lan.title: Games with LAN Mode, OFW and CFW compatible

wan.title: Games with Wireless Mode, CFW only: it needs ldn_mitm kip

switchModule.title: Switch Sysmodule and Homebrew (ldn_mitm)
switchModule.text: For the ldn_mitm compatibility list and links, please visit

module.title: {prefix}Download ldn_mitm to play non LAN supported games (Requires CFW)

client.title: LAN Play Client
client.text: The client is provided by spacemeowx2:

servers.message: These servers are not linked to this site. We list them to help you find other players who speak the same language.

communities.title: Communities
communities.message: These communities are not linked to this site. We list them to help you find other players who speak the same language.

configuration.title: {prefix}{type} configuration
configuration.text: You need to manually edit the configuration of your local network with this informations.
configuration.note: Note: The IP address can be any from {start} to {end}, excepting {gateway}. But don't use the same IP address with your friend.

games.title: {prefix}You can now play games that have the LAN play feature

switch.ARMS: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] on the main menu screen.
switch.Bayonetta 2: Enter tag climax and highlight local play. Press [Left Analog (hold down)] and press [L] + [R].
switch.Mario Golf: Super Rush: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] on the main menu screen.
switch.Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] on the main menu screen.
switch.Mario Tennis Aces: Select Free Play from the Main Menu. Press [Left Analog (hold down)] and press [L] + [R].
switch.Nintendo Switch Sports: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] on the main menu screen.
switch.Pokémon Shield: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] in the options menu.
switch.Pokémon Sword: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] in the options menu.
switch.Pokkén Tournament DX: From the main screen select a game. Press [X] + [Dpad-Down] and press [L] + [R].
switch.Splatoon 2: Press [L] + [R] + [Left Analog] at the local play option. Hold down until the lan mode is activated.
switch.Splatoon 3: From Splatsville Main square, press [X] to bring up the menu, select The Shoal, hold [ZL] + [ZR] and [Left Analog (hold down)].
